title: dhru9
author: dhru9
content: The Sandbox sand price prediction (After the bear market) What do you think going to be with sand token after bear market? It so down from ALH do you think is going to be big meta project?Sand token price prediction by coinridersWhat is the prediction by you users?

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Sand hasn't bottomed yet. Most altcoins have not yet hit its bottomed. You'll  see it when  you switch to longer time frame. Bitcoin may rise already to  $22K but majority of altcoins may not yet. I think Sand will still go below $0.70 when there are more bad news that will come that might break support lines. Just my speculation though. I could be wrong

comments.author: ANSEL_2.0
comments.body: Quote from: bittraffic on June 22, 2022, 05:15:56 AMSand hasn't bottomed yet. Most altcoins have not yet hit its bottomed. You'll  see it when  you switch to longer time frame. Bitcoin may rise already to  $22K but majority of altcoins may not yet. I think Sand will still go below $0.70 when there are more bad news that will come that might break support lines. Just my speculation though. I could be wrong And the dip will continue if BTC decides to lose its cool one more time, I think this recovery is just temporary, BTC can't bottom at 20000$ there will be more devaluation as we enter deep into this bear market, as for altcoins people will be shocked because they will lose more value.
